text:
"Sun...kiss?"
"Kenapa? Pasti kauâ€“"
CHUU
"Selamat pagi Ni-ki adik hyung yang paling jahil! Cepatlah pergi sikat gigi lalu sarapan!"
Ni-ki mematung, bukan nya mendapat caci maki ia malah mendapat kecupan manis pada pipinya yang sekarang sudah merah merona, Jay yang sepertinya tak ambil pusing pun segera membangunkan yang lain kecuali Sunghoon yang ternyata sudah terduduk menatap keduanya sedari tadi.
"Kalian bersih-bersih ya, nanti turun sarapan!"
Setelah itu Jay pun keluar kamar untuk menunggu mereka di dapur, tinggalah ke empat pemuda itu yang malah saling lempar pandang, ah lebih tepatnya Jungwon dan Jake yang bingung dengan Sunghoon yang menatap sinis Ni-ki yang sudah senyum penuh kemenangan.
"Sebenarnya ada apa ini?"
"Euh... Jungwon, ayo bergegas ke dapur!"
Jake yang peka akan keadaan segera menarik Jungwon meninggalkan Sunghoon dan Ni-ki yang masih betah saling lempar pandang.
trans:
"Sun...kiss?"
"Why? You must be-"
CHUU
"Good morning Ni-ki, my playful little brother! Brush your teeth and have your breakfast!"
Ni-ki is freezing, he got a kiss on her cheek instead of scorn, and he is blushing right now, Jay seems okay with it, he wakes the others up except Sunghoon, who was sitting and watching the scene from the start.
"Clean up your bodies, then have the breakfast down stairs!"
After that, Jay got out of the room to wait for them in the kitchen, the four young guys looked at each other, the actual was Jungwon and Jake were confused with Sunghoon who looked at Ni-ki sarcastically, the one who smiled feeling full of victory.
"What's wrong?"
"Hmm... Jungwoon, let's go to the kitchen, quick!"
Jake who smelled the scene, pulled Jungwoon immediately leaving Sungjoon and Ni-ki that still looking at each other.
